first_translate: fiona,

hangle: 아벨이 오늘 네 소개도 정식으로 할 생각이래?
first_translate: does abel plan on introducing you today as well?
I don’t think so.
he said  that would happen next time.
okay...
it’s too bad I won’t get to escort you tonight.
that's unfortunate.
but we did plenty back home.
hmph.

hangle: 둘 다 아주 여유가 넘치는 군.
first_translate: they’re both very laid-back about this.
kids... playtime is over now.

hangle: 두 번째 돌멩이, 넌 알아서 굴러가고.
first_translate: the second pebble will roll away by itself.

hangle: 첫 번째 돌멩이는 나와 함께 간다.
first_translate: and the first one comes with me.
a pebble?
yup, here goes the first pebble--
oops...!
sorry if my hand hit your face just then...!
my face?!
that was a close call...
thank you both...
fiona!
watch where you walk.
tsk...
until you get used to walking like this, hold onto me.
straighten up.
this carriage belongs to us.
gotcha.
by the way, fiona.
I heard you decided to stay here.
did you fall for siegren’s tricks?

hangle: …친구의 슬픔을 모른 척 할 수 없었던 거예요.
first_translate: I couldn’t ignore his sadness.
but shouldn’t you return to house haylon since you’ll inherit its title someday?
isn’t that why you came all the way out here?
you can keep house haylon for yourself.
stop saying things like that...

hangle: 넌 내가 왜 하필 너를 택했는지 궁금해하지도 않는구나.
first_translate: aren’t you curious why I chose you specifically?

hangle: 그야 내가 아벨의 사정을 알고 있으니까.
first_translate: of course not because I know what abel wants.
as a distant relative of the imperial family,
abel hates the current emperor.
when the emperor was young,

hangle: 자신을 위협할 만한 혈육은 전부 죽이거나 쫓아냈고,
first_translate: he killed or chased off anyone whose bloodline threatened him.
abel’s family were among those victims.
if abel has children,

hangle: 그 자식 또한 황실의 핏줄이 되고,
first_translate: then they’d also have royal blood flowing through their veins.
even though they wouldn’t stand much chance of inheriting the throne,
there could still be unnecessary conflict,

hangle: 그 이상으로 아이의 목숨이 위협받는 상황을 만들기 싫은 거겠지.
first_translate: or worse yet, threats against the child’s life.
fiona.
from now on, your name is officially...
...fiona heilon.
alright...
try sounding happier than that.
and...
call me father from now on.
how persistent.
ladies, did you hear?
apparently, “that bastard” appears before everyone today.
shh, watch how you speak.

hangle: 폐하께서 정식 황자로 임명한다는 소문이 있으니까.
first_translate: rumor says his majesty plans to make him into an official prince.
I’ve been told he’s quite handsome.

hangle: 어머, 저는 굉장히 험상궂은 분이라 들었는데요?
first_translate: really? but I thought people say he looks rather rough around the edges.

hangle: 하긴 그 척박한 헤일론에서 왔다고 하니까요.
first_translate: maybe because he grew up in such harsh conditions within house haylon.
come to think of it,

hangle: 헤일론에는 강하지만 매우 잔혹한 마법사가 산대요.
first_translate: house haylon does have a powerful but brutal mage living there.
I’m going to kill them!!!

hangle: 맞아요! 화가 나면 폭풍이 휘몰아친다 들었어요.
first_translate: exactly! apparently, storms rage when she gets angry.
lady priscilla,
what do you think about these rumors?
not sure.

hangle: 뭐가 되었든 일단 보고나서 결정해야 할 일이 아닌가요?
first_translate: let’s wait until we see him ourselves before deciding anything.
i-isn’t that right?
that’s exactly what I thought...!
but...

hangle: 안 그래도 최근 하급 귀족의 딸이 성녀로 증명되어 소란스러운데,
first_translate: with news spreading recently about some low-ranking noblewoman being declared a saintess,
now we have a bastard son appearing as a prince.

hangle: 떠드는 소리가 너무 요란해 머리가 아플 지경이네요.
first_translate: all these rumors are giving me headaches.
right?!
oho.

hangle: 저 청년이 소문의 그 사생아인가 보군.
first_translate: that must be the bastard everyone keeps talking about.
duke abel heilon is standing beside him.

hangle: 헤일론 가문이 저 청년을 지지한다는 소문이 사실인 모양이야.
first_translate: seems like the rumor about house haylon supporting him really is true.
be confident.
okay.
oh wow! look at how dignified he seems.
he radiates light from head to toe...

hangle: 프리실라 영애, 저 청년에게 관심이 있으신가 봐.
first_translate: do you take interest in that man, lady priscilla?
n-not at all.
wait, did our eyes meet just now?
an older beauty looked at me!
nope.
let’s see...
long red hair,
reigning supreme amongst other ladies...
that makes her none other than the villain, livia priscilla.
livia priscilla.

hangle: 본인의 욕망에 충실해서 원하는 건 가져야하는 성격인데다가,
first_translate: she always acts according to her desires and takes whatever she wants.

hangle: 혈통에 대한 자긍심과 자존심도 매우 높은 사람이다.
first_translate: on top of that, she holds great pride in her lineage and self-esteem.

hangle: 시그렌을 처음 본 순간부터 흥미가 생겨,
first_translate: since the moment she met siegren, she took interest in him.
she interfered at every turn with eneis, the main character,
before getting completely defeated and exiting the story...
in short, she’s your typical villainous character.

hangle: 나와 같은 악역 라인이라 어쩐지 좀 정감이 가는걸.
first_translate: for some reason, I feel sympathetic toward her since we share similar roles.

hangle: 시그렌 말고 다른 좋은 사람을 찾아보는 건 어떠냐고
first_translate: I even want to advise her to find someone better than siegren...
man full of sin
man full of sin
but something feels strange ever since earlier...
that woman...
instead of looking at siegren,
why does it seem like she’s only staring at me?!
